title: Privacy in Learning Analytics: Ethical Considerations and Practical Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive customized learning design program for professionals in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Explain at least three privacy protection principles in the process of learning analytics data collection
Diagnose learners' awareness levels of personal information protection through vignette-based survey analysis
Compare differences in personal information sensitivity between data usage in university settings and e-commerce environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
